goFlux 0.2.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    DX4015_import() import.DX4015()

    Import function for the Gasmet DX4015 portable FTIR gas analyzer for humid conditions

    EGM5_import() import.EGM5()

    Import function for the PP-Systems EGM-5 Portable CO2 Gas Analyzer

    G2508_import() import.G2508()

    Import function for Picarro G2508 GHG analyzer

    G4301_import() import.G4301()

    Import function for the Picarro GasScouterTM G4301 Mobile Gas Concentration Analyzer

    GAIA_import() import.GAIA()

    Import function for the automated chamber ECOFlux (GAIA2TECH) synced with multiple chambers and instruments

    LGR_import() import.UGGA()

    Import function for the Los Gatos Research GHG analyzers UGGA and MGGA

    LI6400_import() import.LI6400()

    Import function for LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-6400

    LI7810_import() import.LI7810()

    Import function for LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-7810

    LI7820_import() import.LI7820()

    Import function for LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-7820

    LI8100_import() import.LI8100()

    Import function for LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-8100

    LI8200_import() import.LI8200()

    Import function for LI-COR smart chamber (LI-8200)

    N2OM1_import() import.N2OM1()

    Import function for the Los Gatos Research GHG analyzer N2OM1

    autoID()

    Automatically define measurements' window based on an auxiliary file

    best.flux()

    Automatic selection of best flux estimate

    click.peak()

    Manual identification of start and end of gas measurements

    click.peak.loop()

    Looped manual identification of start and end of gas measurements

    click.peak2()

    Manual identification of start and end of gas measurements

    flux.plot()

    Plots for quality checking of GHG flux measurements

    flux2pdf()

    Save plots to pdf

    goFlux()

    goFlux: a user-friendly GHG fluxes calculation tool

    goFlux.nokmax()

    goFlux (without kappa-max): a user-friendly GHG fluxes calculation tool

    imp.LI6400

    Example gas measurements data from the LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-6400

    imp.LI7820

    Example gas measurements data from the LI-COR GHG analyzer LI-7820

    imp.LI8200

    Example gas measurements data from the LI-COR Smart Chamber

    imp.UGGA

    Example gas measurements data from the LGR GHG analyzer UGGA

    import.G2201i()

    Import function for the Picarro G2201-i Isotopic Analyzer

    import.GT5000()

    Import function for the Gasmet GT5000 Terra - Splashproof multigas FTIR analyzer

    import.GasmetPD()

    Import function for the GasmetPD multiplexer from the University of Padova

    import.LI8250()

    Import function for LI-COR Multiplexer (LI-8250)

    import.N2Oi2()

    Import function for the Los Gatos Research GLA451-N2Oi2

    import.skyline()

    Import function for the SkyLine2D system linked to one GHG analyzer

    import2RData()

    Looping function for quick import of multiple raw gas measurement files

    iso.comp()

    Determine the isotopic composition of CO2 and N2O measurements

    manID.G2201i

    Example gas measurements data from the Picarro G2201-i Isotopic Analyzer

    manID.UGGA

    Example gas measurements data from the LGR analyzer UGGA

    obs.win()

    Define measurements' window for manual identification

    uCH4_import() import.uCH4()

    Import function for the MIRA Ultra CH4/ C2H6 analyzer from Aeris Technologies

    uN2O_import() import.uN2O()

    Import function for the MIRA Ultra N2O/ CO2 analyzer from Aeris Technologies
